synopsis.text: Nimura Kirio, a high school student and unrivaled puppeteer, finds himself in the futuristic world of Danger Planet II in 2007. In this world, conflicts are resolved through the use of remote-controlled robots, known as virtual puppets. Kirio's life takes a turn when he develops feelings for the enigmatic Sairi Takahara. However, winning her heart is no easy task, as she has set a unique challenge: to defeat her formidable virtual puppet, Benkei, before any romantic advances can be made. Brace yourself for a thrilling journey filled with robotic battles and budding romance in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
